div1.p: Indorsed: No. 44 Iditarod Cr. District Court, Fourth Division, Territory of Alaska. United States of America, Plaintiff, vs. Thomas L.Thurston and Agnes V.Thurston, Defendants. Judgment. Filed in the District Court, Territory of Alaska,4th Div. Jul 15, 1915. J.E.Clark, clerk.
IN THE DISTRICT COURT FOR THE DISTRICT OF ALASKA Division No. 4, at Iditarod, Alaska.
United States of America, District of Alaska, Division No. 4. } ss.
C E R T I F I C A T E.

I, J.E. Clark, Clerk of the District Court for the District of Alaska, Division No.4, hereby certify that the foregoing and hereto attached one pages of typewrit- en matter, numbered from 1 to --, both inclusive, con- stitute a full, true, and complete copy, and the whole thereof, of the original Judgment and Sentence of Thomas L. Thurston in cause No.44-l, entitled, United States of America, Plaintiff vs Thomas L. Thurston and Agnes V. Thurston, Defendants, as the same appears on file and of record in my office.
In witness whereof I have hereunto set my hand and the seal of the above-entitled Court this 15th day of July, 1915.
